title: The After Show Discusses Cigars We’ve Been Smoking Lately
itunes:title: The After Show Discusses Cigars We’ve Been Smoking Lately
description:
Today, the after show focuses on what we’ve been smoking lately, Each member of the panel lists and talks about what cigars have been their recent go to selections. The After show is brought to you by Roma Craft Tobac.

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at http://www.2GuysCigars.com/.
